H0.text: what countries makes up the uk. Scotland

H1.text: what countries makes up the uk. Ireland

H2.text: what countries makes up the uk. England

H3.text: what countries makes up the uk. Wales

A4.text: The United Kingdom comprises England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland

A5.text: England is a country that is part of the United Kingdom

A6.text: It is bordered by two other countries of the United Kingdom: to the north by Scotland and to the west by Wales

A7.text: To the south-east, Scotland has its only land border, which is 96 miles (154 km) long and shared with England

A8.text: Wales is a country that is part of the United Kingdom

A9.text: The UK submission defines the UK as including Wales as a principality

A10.text: The UK submission defines the UK as including Northern Ireland as a province
